jwebminer2
Class FeatureValueFileSaver

java.lang.Object
  mckay.utilities.general.FileSaver
      jwebminer2.FeatureValueFileSaver

public class FeatureValueFileSaver
extends mckay.utilities.general.FileSaver

Objects of this class are used by ResultsReportPanels (or other classes) to perform actual saving of data in a variety of formats. This implementation allows the saving of HTML, tab delimited text, ACE Feature Vector XML or Weka ARFF files.

HTML files include the entire displayed contents of a ResultsReportPanel, but other formats only include the table of feature values and their labels.

getFileFormatExtension

public java.lang.String[] getFileFormatExtension()
Provides an array of the extensions of file formats that may be saved with this object.

Overrides:
getFileFormatExtension in class mckay.utilities.general.FileSaver
Returns:
The available file extensions.

saveContents

public void saveContents(java.lang.String chosen_file_extension,
                         java.lang.String data_to_save,
                         java.io.File save_location)
                  throws java.lang.Exception
Save the given text to the given location in the given format or save the stored feature values, depending on the chosen_file_extension. A progress bar is displayed (although not incremented).

Overrides:
saveContents in class mckay.utilities.general.FileSaver
Parameters:
chosen_file_extension - The file extension (corresponding to one of the extensions published by the getFileFormatExtension method) to use when saving data_to_save, and the corresponding file format.
data_to_save - The HTML code displayed on-screen. May be null for non-HTML saving.
save_location - The file to save data_to_save to.
Throws:
java.lang.Exception - Throws an Exception if the file cannot be saved.
